body.p: Power wiring between the Reactor Cabinet and the Bypass Cabinet is completed in manufacturing. Customers must make their own external power and monitoring connections.

Cable entry/exit can be from the top or bottom:
Top and bottom conduit plates on both cabinets are removable.
Conduit plates do not have knock-outs. Installers must make their own conduit cut-outs.
Sufficient conduit space is available to allow RPP V2 units to be daisy-chained to a reserve power source. RPP Conduit Entry
